member.name: KERB_QUERY_DOMAIN_EXTENDED_POLICIES_RESPONSE
member.summary: Contains the results of querying for the extended policies of the specified domain. You must have the SeTcbPrivilege privilege set.

member.name: KERB_QUERY_DOMAIN_EXTENDED_POLICIES_RESPONSE.MessageType
member.summary: A value of the enumeration that lists the types of messages that can be sent to the Kerberos authentication package by calling the function. This member must be set to KerbQueryDomainExtendedPoliciesMessage.

summary.para: Contains flags used for the extended policies.

listheader.description: The Dynamic Access Control (DAC) is disabled so you can't get the extended policies.

member.name: KERB_QUERY_DOMAIN_EXTENDED_POLICIES_RESPONSE.ExtendedPolicies
member.summary: The name of the domain that you are querying for the extended policies.

member.name: KERB_QUERY_DOMAIN_EXTENDED_POLICIES_RESPONSE.DsFlags
member.summary: Flags that represent the requirements. These flags are returned from the function.
